"""
 This script is used in an alarm that acts as a cron job.
 It will start an instance upgrade if any of the following alarms:
 - bt5_upgrader (supported)
 
 "sense" a need of an upgrade. This alarm is likely to disappear soon as it's needed 
 due to lack of functionality (which is that alarms can not automatically "solve" themselves).
 """
 # If before script is present call it.
 before_script = getattr(context, 'ERP5Site_beforeSenseUpgrade', None)
 if before_script is not None:
 before_script()
 
 context.ERP5Site_setupUpgraderSkinSelection()
 
 portal_alarms = context.getPortalObject().portal_alarms
 activate = context.portal_activities.activate
 previous_tag = None
 
 # XXX get the last activate process if exists
 active_process = context.getLastActiveProcess()
 if active_process is None or ((DateTime() - active_process.getStartDate()) > 1):
 active_process = context.newActiveProcess()
 
 active_process = active_process.getPath()
 
 def launchUpgraderAlarm(alarm_id, after_method_id=[]):
 """
 Get the alarm and use sense and solve
 """
 upgrader_alarm = getattr(portal_alarms, alarm_id, None)
 if upgrader_alarm is not None and upgrader_alarm.sense():
 # call solve method
 activate(active_process=active_process,
 activity='SQLQueue', 
 priority=2).Alarm_saveActiveResult(
 summary=upgrader_alarm.getTitle(), 
 severity=0, 
 detail="Upgrade Required for %s" % \
 (upgrader_alarm.getTitle()))
 
 kw = dict(tag=alarm_id)
 if len(after_method_id) > 0:
 kw["after_method_id"] = after_method_id
 # alarm.solve() dos not support activate parameters
 # so it is not possible to use it directly.
 method_id = upgrader_alarm.getSolveMethodId()
 if method_id not in (None, ''):
 method = getattr(upgrader_alarm.activate(**kw), method_id)
 method()
 return [ method_id ]
 return after_method_id
 
 # There is one strict order to run the alarms
 # This is required because the one alarms depends the previous one be
 # Fully done.
 previous_method_id = launchUpgraderAlarm('bt5_upgrader', 
 after_method_id = previous_method_id)
 
 previous_method_id.extend(['updateBusinessTemplateFromUrl',
 'TemplateTool_reinstallBT5',
 'immediateReindexObject'])
 
 previous_method_id = launchUpgraderAlarm('finalize_upgrader',
 after_method_id = previous_method_id)
 
 for alarm_id in ['bt5_upgrader' , 'finalize_upgrader']:
 
 upgrader_alarm = getattr(portal_alarms, alarm_id, None)
 if upgrader_alarm is not None and upgrader_alarm.sense():
 # Upgrade still needed for part.
 #return
 # XXX Do not retry run upgrader again, this is cause too much
 # noise during this stage of development.
 pass
 
 # Nothing else to do, so we can disable.
 context.setEnabled(False)
 return
